function.name: route
function.description: Determine the optimal processing path for the user query. Returns a binary routing decision to either handle the query directly using conversation history or trigger the research workflow for database retrieval.

routing_decision.description: Binary routing decision: 0 = direct_response (handle query using conversation history only, for greetings, system questions, general definitions, and reformatting existing data, no database access required); 1 = research_workflow (trigger database retrieval workflow, for specific financial data requests, entity mentions requiring current data, follow-up data requests, and any query where database access would provide value, when uncertain choose 1).
